						faction = FC_CL
						influence = 2

						influence = 1

country_event = { 
	id = PTM_Politics.002
	title = PTM_Politics.002.t
	desc = PTM_Politics.002.d
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
		every_country = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					num_of_cities = 1
					NOT = { 
						tag = AAA
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_modifier = NO_AllyBG
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = bcv
								value = 100
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = bcv
						value = 2
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = bcv
							value = 100.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = bcv
						value = 100
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_modifier = NO_RivalBG
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = bcv
							value = -99.999
						}
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = bcv
						value = 2
					}
				}

							}
						}

					set_variable = {

					}
				}
			}

						value = 2
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = bdr
							value = 100.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = bdr
						value = 100
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_modifier = BG_RivalState
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = bdr
							value = -99.999
						}
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = bdr
						value = 2
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = bdr
								value = -100
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = {

						value = -100
					}
				}
			}

country_event = { 
	id = PTM_Politics.003
	title = PTM_Politics.003.t
	desc = PTM_Politics.003.desc
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = Pol_ScandalCD
		}
		OR = { 
			check_variable = { 
				which = asn
				value = 5
			}
			check_variable = { 
				which = ass
				value = 5
			}
			check_variable = { 
				which = asx
				value = 5
			}
			check_variable = { 
				which = atc
				value = 10
			}
			check_variable = { 
				which = ati
				value = 10
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = Pol_ScandalCD
				duration = 1825
				hidden = yes
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = hzc
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = hzc
				value = 0
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_NO
						influence = 50
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_NO
							influence = 75
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_NO
								influence = 88
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_NO
									influence = 94
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									faction_influence = { 
										faction = FC_NO
										influence = 97
									}
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										faction_influence = { 
											faction = FC_NO
											influence = 99
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											faction_influence = { 
												faction = FC_NO
												influence = 100
											}
										}
										set_variable = { 
											which = hzc
											value = 100
										}
									}
									else = { 
										set_variable = { 
											which = hzc
											value = 99
										}
									}
								}
								else = { 
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											faction_influence = { 
												faction = FC_NO
												influence = 98
											}
										}
										set_variable = { 
											which = hzc
											value = 98
										}
									}
									else = { 
										set_variable = { 
											which = hzc
											value = 97
										}
									}

					value = -600
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					which = ahf
				}
				divide_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 12
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 0.1
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 10
				}

					which = lsc
					value = 100
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = lsc
					which = ahd
				}

				add_mandate = -2.5

				duration = 2920
				hidden = yes

			if = { 
				limit = { 
					always = yes
				}
				hidden_effect = {

						which = bcy

						limit = {

									which = bcy
									value = -100
								}
							}

							which = bcy
							value = -100
						}

						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = bcy
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = bcy
							value = 100
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bcy
						value = 0.001
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bcy
						value = 1000
					}
				}
				if = {

			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = -600
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					which = ahf
				}
				divide_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 12
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 0.1
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 10
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = lsc
					value = 100
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = lsc
					which = ahd
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -2.5
			}
		}

									is_colony = yes

							}

						which = bds
						value = 0.001
					}

						which = bds

				}

			which = hzc

				id = PTM_Politics.001
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = PTM_Politics.004
	title = PTM_Politics.004.t
	desc = PTM_Politics.004.desc
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = Pol_DeathCD
		}
		OR = { 
			check_variable = { 
				which = asn
				value = 5
			}
			check_variable = { 
				which = ass
				value = 5
			}
			check_variable = { 
				which = asx
				value = 5
			}
			check_variable = { 
				which = atc
				value = 10
			}
			check_variable = { 
				which = ati
				value = 10
			}
		}
	}

		name = PTM_Politics.004.a
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = hzc
						which = hzd

			custom_tooltip = TR_FactionBoost_-10
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = oqd
					value = -10
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = PTM_Politics.001
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = Pol_DeathAccept_TR
				duration = 1825
				hidden = yes
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = hzg
						which = hzc
					}
					check_variable = {

				limit = { 
					always = yes
				}

					change_variable = { 
						which = bdq
						value = -30
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = bdq
									value = -100
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = bdq
							value = -100
						}
					}

							check_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = bdq
							value = 100
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bdq
						value = 0.001
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bdq
						value = 1000
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						always = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = NO_RelationState_-30
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = -300
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}

							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = {

								value = 0
							}
						}

							}
						}

							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = {

							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}

					which = ahd

				}

				id = PTM_Politics.001
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = PTM_Politics.005
	title = PTM_Politics.005.t
	desc = PTM_Politics.005.d
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				tag = TIM
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_variable = { 
				which = hzc
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = hzd
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = hze
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = hzf
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = hzg
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = hzh
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = hzi
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = hzj
				value = 0
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = hxo
						value = 1
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = hzc
					which = hxo
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = hxq
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = hze
						value = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = hxq
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = hzf
						value = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = hxq
							value = 3
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = hzg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = hxq
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = hzh
						value = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = hxq
							value = 5
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = hzi
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = hzd
					value = 1

								set_variable = { 
									which = bdt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdt
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdt
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_tooltip = TR_RelationState_-5
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = hzj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = bdt
								value = -10
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = bdt
											value = -100
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdt
									value = -100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = bdt
										value = 100.001
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdt
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdt
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_tooltip = TR_RelationState_-10
						}
					}
				}
				else = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = bdt
								value = -15
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = {

						if = {

						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = hzi
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				if = {

				}
				else = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = -15
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = {

										}
									}
								}

									which = bdu

								}
							}
							else_if = {

									}
								}

							}

						if = { 
							limit = {

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = PTM_Politics.001
			}
		}
	}
}

	option = { 
		name = PTM_Politics.006.a
		log = "SYS-Politics:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:allied with:Nobles:+:[This.GovernmentName]"
		custom_tooltip = Pol_NewAlignment_NO
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = Pol_Alignment_NO
			duration = -1
			hidden = yes
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = hxn
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					government = republic
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = hzs
							value = 50
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = bdr
								value = -10
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = bdr
											value = -100
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdr
									value = -100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = bdr
										value = 100.001
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdr
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdr
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdr
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes

					}

									which = bdt

								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = Ruler_MIL_5_neg
								}
							}
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = Ruler_MIL_5_neg
								duration = -1
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_modifier = Ruler_MIL_5_neg
						}
						remove_country_modifier = Ruler_MIL_5_neg
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = arh

							}

						which = hun
						value = 1
					}

						which = hun
						which = bcn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = hun
						which = hun
					}

						which = hun
						value = 100
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bcn
						value = 100
					}

						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
				}
				every_subject_country = { 
					limit = { 
						is_lesser_in_union = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = hui
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = huj
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = {

					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = hum
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = hup
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = huq
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = hur
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = hux
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = hus
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = hun
						which = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = PTM_Politics.008
	title = PTM_Politics.008.t
	desc = PTM_Politics.008.d
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		check_variable = { 
			which = hxn
			value = 1
		}
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = hxn
					value = 1
				}
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_NO
						influence = 30
					}
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = hxn
					value = 2
				}
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_BG
						influence = 30
					}
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = hxn
					value = 3
				}
				NOT = {

						influence = 30
					}

			}

					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bds
						value = 0.001
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bds
						value = 1000
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						always = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = CL_RelationState_-40
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = hxn
					value = 4
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Pol_EndAlignment_TR
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					always = yes
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = bdt
						value = -40
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = bdt
									value = -100
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = bdt
							value = -100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = bdt
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = bdt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bdt
						value = 0.001
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bdt
						value = 1000
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						always = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = TR_RelationState_-40
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = hxn
					value = 5
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Pol_EndAlignment_BU
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					always = yes
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = bdu
						value = -40
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = -100
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = bdu
							value = -100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = bdu
							value = 100
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bdu
						value = 0.001
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = bdu
						value = 1000
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						always = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = BU_RelationState_-40
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = PTM_Politics.100
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = { 
		always = no
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = bcv
					value = -90
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = bcw
					value = -90
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = bcx
					value = -90
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = bcy
					value = -90
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = bcz
					value = -90
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = bda
					value = -90
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = bdb
					value = -90
				}
			}

				check_variable = { 
					which = bdc
					value = -90
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = bdd
					value = -90
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = bde
					value = -90
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = NO_RivalBG
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = NO_RivalCL
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = NO_RivalTR
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = NO_RivalBU
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = BG_RivalCL
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = BG_RivalTR
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = BG_RivalBU
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = CL_RivalTR
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = CL_RivalBU
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = TR_RivalBU
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = bcv
						value = -90
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = bcv
							value = -95
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = { 
					50 = { }
					50 = {

							which = iac
							value = 1
						}
						set_variable = {

							value = 2
						}

							id = PTM_Politics.101
						}
					}
				}
			}

					75 = { }
					25 = {

							which = iac
							value = 1
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = iad
							value = 2
						}
						country_event = { 
							id = PTM_Politics.101

	id = PTM_Politics.101
	title = PTM_Politics.101.t
	desc = PTM_Politics.101.d
